Literature.Title: Effect of ring size on conformation and biological activity of cyclic cationic antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Jelokhani-Niaraki M, Kondejewski LH, Wheaton LC, Hodges RS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=16µg/ml),Streptococcus mitis(MIC=4µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=1µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes(MIC=0.25µg/ml),Corynebacterium jeikeium(MIC=1µg/ml),Acinetobacter calcoaceticus(MIC=2µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=256µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia(MIC=8µg/ml),Serratia marcescens(MIC=256µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=64µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=8µg/ml)
